data.text:
I was very scared reading all the previous reviews from the hotel .
I emailed the reservation Center a few times before my arrival .
I have to say that I had a marvellous staying in .
I was there for 11 nights .
The housekeeping manager , a very gentil gentleman , greeted myself and my auntie on our arrival, shown us our two different bedrooms that he and his staff had prepared specially for us with a delicious and traditional fruit platter served in UAE .
I had the same housekeeper cleaning my bedroom daily , it made all special!
I didn‚Äôt have any issue with Air Conditioning or wi-fi at my room , on the opposite side . The AC was working perfectly fine .
The guys downstairs at the door were incredible friendly and on the top to help and assist with anything .
The receptionist ladies always friendly , professional and smiling. 

The hotel has yes a very busy and well know club during the night time . YES !
If you arrive after 21:00 you will see guests coming to the club good looking women and men as it is ‚Äú dress to impress‚Äù!

I was staying there with my auntie who is 69 years old and she kinda of liked to see many people around . 

I honestly had a fantastic experience!
Thank you very much for the hotel team .
I will definitely get back to you.
data.title: AMAZING TIME!

data.text: The nightclub and rooms are not sound-proofed; so the disturbing base in the nightclub is ‚Äúfelt‚Äù (not only heard)  6 stories up. There are some jurisdictions where nightclub licence can be revoked because of noise and trespass. I am surprised Dubai was not one of them.
data.title: Noisy. Nightclub is not sound-proof. If that‚Äôs fixed, then decent 3 start property.

data.text:
Although it is a good price per night, when we arrive on the first day at the hotel, the reception inform us they they do not have any booking when we book trough hotels.com. They even inform us that we have been frauded and when we asked them about the website they inform us that it is fake and it is not theirs.(till today I still do not understand that they inform us that it is fake. If its true, they should report it)  To cut a long story short after 1hr waiting they found the booking trough Expedia.

As for Room, it is ok for those who are looking for a 3 star Hotel. One of the advantages it is a 5 mins walk trough a metro station
data.title: Average

data.text:
Affordable hotel with nice and clean room. Big size bed and complete amenities! Near Al rigga metro station! And some restaurants and supermarkets! 

Very accommodating staff! 
Thank you keep safe! 
Looking forward to go back here! üòäüòäüòäüòä
data.title: Safe and confortable place!

data.text:
yesterday it was the third time that I have gone to al sarab Hotel i checke in yesterday at 7 pm . really we had good time during our stay . 
I would like to thank reception team they are professional specially Miss sarah she is friendly and she was  helpful to  handled  my booking  and attentive to all request.
I would like to thank Mr tahir for cooperation and supportive .
The staff are very kind and helpful unusually . 
Room service is fast and accurate and they are given  excellent service  .
Once again thanks for care and good hospitality and My choice will always be for stay al sarab hotel .
data.title: Excellent hospitality
